EmailTemplate.name: 201811_WebinarInvite_JetWaveUpgrade.201811_WebinarInvite_JetWaveUpgrade_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Discover the Advantages of Upgrading Your JetWave Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> TECH TIPS WEBINAR:
Discover the Advantages of Upgrading your JetWave Software Please join us... Two Options: 4 December: 11am-12pm EST <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_UbTMZcyBQSG1vWNU6sGptA> (UTC -5) <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_UbTMZcyBQSG1vWNU6sGptA>
5 December:: 9pm-10pm EST <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_EajuU2rzRUWFDsiRWR1r1Q> (UTC -5) <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_EajuU2rzRUWFDsiRWR1r1Q>
Location Please click the appropriate link above to register.
Are you still on an older version of JetWave software? Discover the advantages of upgrading to black label version 6 or 7.1. Learn more about improvements to the user interface, a new data loader, SNMP and logging changes, and overcoming current terminal issues.
Expert Lyes Hammad will explain how these changes can improve JetWave system maintenance, while also providing status on JetWave in-service technical issues.
Register by selecting one of the two available sessions. After you register, you have the option to save this meeting to your calendar.
Questions will be answered.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
Do you have a minute? We’d appreciate your opinion on technical videos and webinars. Please take this short survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/TechVideo>.
